title: Cover for Le Surréalisme en 1947
medium: Multiple of foam rubber breast, velvet, and printed label mounted on cover from an illustrated book with 18 lithographs, four etchings (two with aquatint), two woodcuts, one photogravure, and one ready-made object
dimensions: cover (unfolded): 9 7/16 x 17 11/16 x 2" (24 x 45 x 5.1 cm)
